attributes.action: Change the law that allows animals to be slaughtered without prior stunning for religious purposes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many people and organisations feel strongly about this matter. It is infact cruel to the animal to be killed without being stunned first. Religion should not put people above the law to cause suffering to animals. Religious Slaughter is carried out under "strict" regulations according to the government and does not cause unnecessary suffering to the animal. But the fact remails the animal still suffers. Religious Slaughter should be stopped and all animals that must be killed must be stunned first.
